name: Order of Tacos
description:
5 Traditional Street style Beef tacos. Garnished with salsa, chopped onion and cilantro. 
 Hmm yum

name: Order of Enchiladas
description:
4 Traditional Enchiladas. Stuffed with Cheese. Garnished with chopped cabbage, chopped onion and cheese. Include side of beans and rice. 
 Hmm yum

name: Greek Salad
description: A delicious greek salad with tomato, letucce, feta, chile and onion. Fresh!
